itunes:summary:
Former Navy SEAL and college baseball player Jason Kuhn talks about helping Braves reliever Tyler Matzek get over the yips and helping Atlanta win the World Series, working with other baseball players on getting over their yips, how he helps golfers improve their mental toughness and keep their swings consistent, and how he found a passion for helping athletes.
